solution_line_template: To make the pizza, Kimber half as many teaspoons of salt as the number of cups of flour, meaning she needs {salt_fraction}*{flour_cups} = <<{flour_cups}*{salt_fraction}={salt_teaspoons}>>{salt_teaspoons} teaspoons of salt.
The total number of cups of flour and teaspoons of salt she needs is {salt_teaspoons}+{flour_cups} = <<{salt_teaspoons}+{flour_cups}={flour_and_salt_total}>>{flour_and_salt_total}

She also needs {water_cups} cups of water, which means the total number of cups of water and flour and teaspoons of salt she needs is {flour_and_salt_total}+{water_cups} = <<{flour_and_salt_total}+{water_cups}={combined_total}>>{combined_total}
